subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: On a day when Ivan Nova returned to form to help beat the Blue Jays, the Yankees lost C. C. Sabathia because of elbow soreness and acquired the veteran free-agent pitcher Derek Lowe.
snippet: On a day when Ivan Nova returned to form to help beat the Blue Jays, the Yankees lost C. C. Sabathia because of elbow soreness and acquired the veteran free-agent pitcher Derek Lowe.
